segments.text: Hello . Is my laundry ready ? My room number is 210 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid it is still being washed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you take the stain off ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we can . But you need wait a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . Can I get it back in the afternoon ? I really need them tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it will be ready then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . By the way , please get them pressed .
segments.speaker: S2
